reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: EVERY LAST ONE OF THESE HAS FAILED IN LESS THAN A YEAR SOME IN JUST TWO WEEKS. THE LIGHTS WILL STILL TURN ON AND OFF BUT THE DIMMER - THE MOST IMPORTANT PART OF A DIMMER SWITCH - FAILS.... CHEAP PARTS AND THEY SHOULD KNOW IT MAKING THIS PRODUCT A REAL SCAM IN MY OPINION - DO NOT BUY THIS
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2025
reviews.title: CHEAP INTERNAL PARTS FAIL QUICKLY !!!

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I had one just fall apart as I installed it. A little tab broke and I couldn't make it stay together under actual use. And another does not properly dim the light as it is supposed to do. The rest, just fine. You can't really argue about the price, but you know the old adage about getting what you pay for. I think I would buy them again if I needed that many.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2025
reviews.title: Mixed results using a 10 pack of these

reviews.text: The dimming feature works well. They are easy to install if you have basic handy man skills. The look great. They are compatible with most wiring layouts with a few exceptions. Be aware that you may get some flickering with certain led lights when you dim them. I only had this issue on one light and it's notna big deal.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2024
reviews.title: May flicker with led

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I bought and installed these about 2 years ago. One day my daughter try to switch the light on, it arced, which scared her. She called me to check it out. I tried and it arced again. We could have been shocked but were lucky. Needless to say, i replaced it with a different brand from HD. 2 stars because i got two years of use out of it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
reviews.title: Broken after 2 years - arcing and dangerous

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: One can tell if a switch is a quality product if the rocker is firm and tight when switched between on and off --- this one is very lose and finicky. So much so that it takes so little effort to mistakenly switched if off when you are trying to switch it on. Plus the product is so light that it gives you the impression of a cheap material. I wanted to return it but it was past the date of return. The only advantag eof this switch is that it handles a 3 way switch with no issue but i wish it could have been built more solidly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024
reviews.title: Cheap Material

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The dimmers I received are the slim type, no mention of that in desperation. Mounting screws were shown in image, none provided. After reading some less than positive reviews I’m concerned w/the longevity of the switches. I have purchased other Bestten dimmers and paid more for the deeper design that came with mounting screws and faceplate. I haven’t had any issues with any of those. Update: found mounting screws in packet of wire nuts. These also seem to be Quite style switches, also no mentioned in description.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2024
reviews.title: Item does not match image or description

reviews.text: My son bought these for his house and since I am an electrician by trade I was obligated to do the install. I have to say that they were much better than I had first thought. So much so that I bought some for my house. So far so good. I would not hesitate to buy more.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I guess. 2 stars because all 5 worked but feel very cheap and when they don't have that strong sounding click, you know they will build up carbon deposits on the contactors. Dimmer slide sticks also. If you're a flipper and don't care about long term then these are perfect. But if you're a homeowner, spend the money and get a better switch because every time you turn the lights on or off, you'll wish you bought a better quality switch
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2024
reviews.title: Poor quality, won't last long

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I bought this product because it met the Eletrcrians requirements—it is UL Listed. The photo and description clearly indicate that it is UL listed. However, the product I received is not. There is no indication on the box or product that it is UL-listed. Not sure why they would be allowed to say something that is that important and not be able to provide that certification.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2024
reviews.title: Missleading photo.

reviews.text: 2 of these have issues with the on and off switch. You have to push hard on the top to make the light come on. And also the dimmer is different on the ones that have issues. reviews.text: These don't work with LED bulbs. To ensure the issue wasn't with the wiring configuration I removed and replaced the dimmer with a normal (non-dimming) switch. Company should be called Worsten, not Bessten.

reviews.text: Well I had problems with two switches that didn’t work the other switches the adjustments wouldn’t set correctly light if you adjust the light to be dim and turn the light off wait a minute or less and turn it back on it wouldn’t until you slide the dimmer switch up. reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Did a great job on being able to tone down some of the lights in our house. Only issue is their color of white. They are slightly off white as compared to the snow white of typical wall plates. Most might not notice but I can see the difference. One note to keep in mind. It may not work well with a fixture that has many bulbs. We have a "Sputnik" fixture over our dining room table with 15 bulbs. Goes from full bright to full dim with just a slight move of the slider. Tried another brand dimmer and did the same.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.title: Work well

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: When the dimmer is on the lowest setting the lights don’t turn on. You need to increase the dimmer for lights to go on. Also when on a lower setting the lights sometimes just randomly go out. They work but you need to mess with them every time you want your lights to turn on. Really annoying bc I used these things all over my house! I don’t understand why the reviews were so high on this product. I bought 15 of these things and they all have the same exact issue.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Simple installation instructions, these work in 3way or 4way circuits. These do NOT require a re-wire like some smart dimmers. The switch dims from a single location, all other locations on a 3way or 4way are simple on/off switches. There is a separate rotary adjustment on the switch behind the wall plate for minimum level on the user control slide switch. This setting sets the LED lights to consistently come on and not flicker at a low level. If you are looking for a simple, no fuss dimmer option for your dimmable LED lights without "smart" controls, this will work.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.title: No fuss 3-way dimmer

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 5 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, LED Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The color is Ivory not white so putting next to other switches and a white face plate looks off. The adjustment wheel to set the dimming level works well. Large ears that stick out on both sides of the device prevent you from installing two next to each other. One has to sit behind the other and thus when installing the cover plate the paddles are at uneven depths. Also, prefer the direct wire-to-side screws rather than the wire nut connection.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.title: Color is Ivory not white
